title: Dutch Courage from Highlands Bar and Grill Recipe
full_text:
Dutch Courage from Highlands Bar and Grill Recipe
Close
Jump to recipe
Prep
5 mins
Active
5 mins
Total
5 mins
Serves
1 serving
Cook Mode
(Keep screen awake)
Ingredients
Ice
1 1/2
ounces
genever
Scant
1/2
ounce
cointreau
2 1/2
ounces
Satsuma juice
2
dashes
orange bitters
Small
slice
of a Satsuma or
blood orange
Directions
Fill a cocktail shaker with ice. Add genever, Cointreau, Satsuma juice, and orange bitters. Shake well and strain into an ice filled rocks glass.
Special equipment
cocktail shaker and strainer
Gin
